name: Project PanPan
description:
The Project Panpan is 2D topdown shooter. This game is currently in a early stage of development, I like to call it a "early demo prototype".  

These are the controls:

  • Left Mouse Button : make your character shoot
  • Mouse : make your character aim
  • Z : move your character up
  • Q : move your character left
  • S : move your character down
  • D : move your character right

(These controls are the AZERTY equivalent of the standard WASD controls)

Your mission is the find the blue portal in the levels and to walk on it. Have fun !

Feel free to report the bugs you find or to tell me if you have suggestion ! I hope you'll enjoy playing this game !
